subject: Home Loan Application Request
body:
Dear Bank Manager,

I am writing to apply for a home loan of $350,000. I have been a customer of your bank for the past 8 years and have maintained a good credit history. I am currently employed at TechCorp as a Senior Software Engineer with an annual salary of $120,000.

I have attached my recent pay stubs, tax returns for the last 2 years, and property details. The property I wish to purchase is located at 123 Oak Street, valued at $400,000.

Please let me know the next steps in the application process.

Best regards,
John Doe
Account Number: ACC-2024-1001
